description:
The whole gang reminisces as they look through a magical photo album together. Then Viola catches a cold, which she handles in a totally mature and reasonable way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Majoshikai no Tsuikai Jijou / Genki Musume no Kaze Jijou
The Reminiscing Circumstances of the Witch-Girl Time Crew / The Sniffly Circumstances of the Healthy Daughter
魔女子会の追懐事情 / 元気娘の風邪事情
